Verses: 1 dhevane, En Irudhayam Aayaththamaayirukkiradhu; Naan Paadi Keerththanampannuven, En Magimaiyum Paadum.
2 veenaiye, Suramandalame, Vizhiyungal; Naan Adhigaalaiyil Vizhippen.
3 karththaave, Janangalukkulle Ummai Thudhippen; Jaadhigalukkulle Ummai Keerththanampannuven.
4 umadhu Kirubai Vaanangalukkumelaagavum, Umadhu Saththiyam Megamandalangal Bariyandhamum Ettugiradhu.
5 dhevane, Vaanangalukku Melaaga Uyarndhirum; Umadhu Magimai Boomiyanaiththinmelum Uyarndhiruppadhaaga.
6 umadhu Piriyar Viduvikkappadum Poruttu, Umadhu Valadhukaraththinaal Ratchiththu, Engal Jebaththai Kettarulum.
7 dhevan Thamadhu Parisuththaththaikkondu Vilambinaar; Aagaiyaal Kalikooruven; Seegemai Pangittu, Sukkoththin Pallaththaakkai Alandhukolluven.
8 keeleyaath Ennudaiyadhu, Manaaseyum Ennudaiyadhu; Eppiraayeem En Thalaiyin Belan, Yoodhaa En Niyaayappiramaanigan.
9 movaab En Paadhapaaththiram; Edhominmel En Paadharatchaiyai Eriven; Pelisthiyaavinmel Aarpparippen.
10 aranaana Pattanaththirkul Ennai Nadaththikkondu Pogiravan Yaar? Edhommattum Enakku Vazhikaattugiravan Yaar?
11 engal Senaigalode Purappadaamalirundha Dhevareerallavaa? Engalai Thallivittirundha Dhevareerallavaa?
12 ikkattil Engalukku Udhaviseyyum; Manushanudaiya Udhavi Virudhaa.
13 dhevanaale Baraakkiramanseyvom; Avare Engal Saththurukkalai Midhiththuppoduvaar.
